user.title: Setup of DiveraControl
user.description: Please choose an option for configuration.

login.title: User login
login.description:
Please enter a username and password. The login credentials are only used for the initial data query and are not stored.
Also set the polling interval for data queries outside and during active alarms.

api_key.title: Enter API key
api_key.description: If login fails or a system user should be registered, you can alternatively enter the user's API key here.

multi_cluster.title: Select unit
multi_cluster.description: Multiple units were found for the entered user. Please select the desired unit. Additional units must be added separately.

reconfigure.title: Change configuration for DiveraControl
reconfigure.description: By changing the API key, a different user can be linked to the unit. Additionally, the two polling intervals can be reconfigured.

abort.new_data_only:
Configuration completed.

The following units have been created: {new_data}
abort.existing_data_only:
Configuration completed.

The following units already exist and were not created: {existing_data}
abort.no_new_hubs_found: No new units were found, hence no new hubs were created.
abort.missing_entry_id: Hub ID could not be determined.
